text: David Travis Fryman (born March 25, 1969) played Major League Baseball from 1990 to 2002. He played for the Detroit Tigers (1990–1997) and for the Cleveland Indians from 1998 to 2002). He usually played third base, but he also played shortstop. Fryman made 5 All–Star teams and won a Gold Glove Award in 2000. ==Other websites== * Category:American baseball players Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Kentucky Category:People from Lexington, Kentucky Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Detroit Tigers players
title: Travis Fryman
